text: Atanas Georgiev Semerdzhiev (21 May 1924 - 8 May 2015) was a Bulgarian politician. He served as the Vice President of Bulgaria from 1 August 1990 to 22 January 1992, under Zhelyu Zhelev. He was Army Chief of Staff from 1962 until the fall of communism in 1989. He was a member of the Bulgarian Socialist Party (BSP). Semerdzhiev was born near Velingrad. He was a soldier during World War II. Semerdzhiev died on 8 May 2015, aged 90. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Vice presidents of Bulgaria Category:Bulgarian generals Category:Military personnel of World War II
title: Atanas Semerdzhiev
